page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In the playground we play{two {different kinds of games.}One type is {"Singing games"}and the other is {"Chasing games".}Three singing games are;{A sailor went to I-I-I, I went to {a Chinese baker's shop and Um Pom Pei. Two people play these games. They stand face to face and clap their hands in a certain way while singing the rhyme. The{young children}play at {Ring O' Roses.}Our{favourite chasing {games}are ;{Levo, Aeroplane Tig and {Chipped , Cracked and Broken. Aeroplane Tig is called this because when we are touched we stand still with our arms stretched out like the wings of an aeroplane. We are released when someone runs under our arms. We also enjoy playing games with definite rules such as rounders and football.
